people_also_ask.question: Is Final Fantasy VII still worth playing?
people_also_ask.heading: Its blocky, low-detail models and muddy backgrounds have made it harder for modern audiences to get into. It's clunky translation, at times, borders on nonsense. All that being said, Final Fantasy 7 remains a powerful experience all these years later, and its greatest strengths far outweigh its myriad faults.04-Mar-2021
people_also_ask.title: Why The Original Final Fantasy 7 Is Still Worth Playing

people_also_ask.question: How long is ff7 100%?
people_also_ask.heading: When focusing on the main objectives, Final Fantasy VII is about 36½ Hours in length. If you're a gamer that strives to see all aspects of the game, you are likely to spend around 83½ Hours to obtain 100% completion.
people_also_ask.title: How long is Final Fantasy VII? | HowLongToBeat

people_also_ask.question: Is ff7 the first soldier free?
people_also_ask.heading: As noted above, Final Fantasy VII The First Soldier is now available, free to play on both iOS and Android devices. The launch features the first season of the title, "Rise of Shinra," and is set in Midgar prior to Final Fantasy VII proper.6 hours ago
